products.title: Products and Services
products.desc: Gain a unique training experience with the best services at your disposal.

train.title: Sports Training Component
train.desc: Focused on physical training and enhancing athletic performance, it includes personalized exercises, advanced training techniques, and conditioning programs.

nutrition.title: Sports Nutrition Component
nutrition.desc: Covers personalized meal plans that complement the training regimen, ensuring the athlete receives the necessary nutrients for recovery.

psychology.title: Sports Psychology Component
psychology.desc: Focused on strengthening the athlete's mental health, including visualization techniques, stress management, and resilience development.

adventure.title: Adventure Component
adventure.desc: Explore the world without limits, discovering surprising destinations and unforgettable experiences. Venture out, explore, and enrich your spirit with each journey, creating memories that last a lifetime.

running.title: Running Component
running.desc: Enhance your running training by accessing articles, videos, and techniques to achieve your goals. Train, progress, and push your limits with each session, building a path to success.

esports.title: E-Sports Component
esports.desc: Immerse yourself in the exciting world of E-Sports. Feel the adrenaline of competition and join a global community from the comfort of your home. Explore, compete, and revitalize your energy with every match!

plans.title: Plans and Pricing
plans.desc: Choose the plan that suits you

bronce.name: Intermediate Plan (Bronze)
bronce.desc: Perfect for those seeking a balance between cost and benefit, and aiming for steady, sustained progress.

platinum.name: Platinum Plan
platinum.desc: Designed for those who want to maximize their performance and achieve more ambitious goals.

diamont.name: Diamond Plan
diamont.desc: The most complete and exclusive option. Ideal for those seeking a comprehensive and high-performance approach.

plans.maintain: muscle maintenance sessions (which may include muscle-joint rehabilitation, hydrotherapy, aromatherapy, reflexology, chromotherapy)
plans.note: Sessions can be taken virtually and/or in person
plans.dudes_title: Still unsure which plan to choose?
plans.dudes_text: I can tailor the plan according to your needs and budget!

methods.name: Aromatherapy
methods.desc: Aromatherapy uses essential oils extracted from plants to promote relaxation, relieve stress, and improve emotional well-being. These oils are applied through massages, inhalation, or diffusion. Benefits include reducing anxiety, improving sleep, and relieving muscle pain.

methods.name: Aquatherapy (or hydrotherapy)
methods.desc: This involves performing exercises and therapy in water. Water provides support and resistance, which facilitates rehabilitation and muscle strengthening. Benefits include improved mobility, pain relief, and enhanced relaxation.

methods.name: Reflexology
methods.desc: Reflexology is based on stimulating specific points on the feet, hands, or ears to influence organs and systems in the body. Each area reflects a part of the body. Benefits include stress relief, improved circulation, and energetic balance.

methods.name: Chromotherapy
methods.desc: Chromotherapy uses colors to influence emotional and physical states. It is applied through lights of different shades or by visualizing colors. Benefits include promoting harmony, stimulating energy, and aiding in the treatment of specific conditions.

faqs.title: FAQs
faqs.desc: Find the most frequently asked questions when purchasing a training plan.
faqs.q1: How is the initial evaluation and progress tracking conducted?
faqs.q2: What kind of monitoring and support do you provide during the program?
faqs.q3: How do you structure your personalized training plans?
faqs.q4: Do you offer in-person training, online training, or both?
faqs.q5: Besides conventional training, what other methods or types of training do you offer?
faqs.q6: Can I contact you outside of training sessions?
faqs.q7: How is the plan adjusted if my circumstances change during the program?
faqs.q9: Are there any additional costs for equipment or specific facilities required for the training?
